v3.files_info: Les téléchargements de pages post-création sont stockés dans un dossier d'images temporaire. Ce dossier contient des images d'entrée qui ne sont pas publiées ou des brouillons enregistrés par l'utilisateur. Vous pouvez régulièrement supprimer le dossier pour gagner le même espace hôte.

buzzycontact.Subject: Sujet:
Your email address has been verified.
A fresh verification link has been sent: A fresh verification link has been sent to your email address.
Comment awaits your approval: :title: Comment awaits your approval: :title

Your comment for :title has been deleted: Your comment for :title has been deleted!
Your comment for :title has been approve: Your comment for :title has been approved!
You must be verify your email to comment: You must be verify your email to comment. To verify your email go to profile settings.
Thanks for your comment. Your comment wi: Thanks for your comment. Your comment will appear after it is approved!
You have already voted this comment!: You have already voted this comment!
You have already reported this comment!: You have already reported this comment!
Subscribe Us on :name: Abonnez-nous sur :name

Support Us on :name: Soutenez-nous sur :name
Follow Us on :name: Suivez-nous sur :name
Vous ne pouvez pas désactiver la langue par défaut du site.
Successfully Sent. Thanks for participat: Envoyé avec succès. Merci d'avoir participé !
You are receiving this email because we: Vous recevez cet email car nous avons reçu une demande de réinitialisation de mot de passe pour votre compte.
If you did not request a password reset,: Si vous n'avez pas demandé de réinitialisation de mot de passe, vous pouvez ignorer ce message.
Maximum File Upload Size: Taille maximale de téléchargement de fichier
Maximum size for a single file user can: Taille maximale pour un seul fichier que l'utilisateur peut télécharger. Par défaut :2000=2 Mo
Comments area title: Titre de la zone de commentaires
Comment must be manually approved: Le commentaire doit être approuvé manuellement

If a comment gets # number of likes then: If a comment gets # number of likes then show that comment in popular comments section

Email me when anyone posts a reply to co: Email me when anyone posts a reply to comment?
Email me when a comment is held for appr: Email me when a comment is held for approve?
Email user when comment is approved?: Email user when comment is approved?
Email user when comment is deleted?: Email user when comment is deleted?
Admin, moderator and guest user badges o: Admin, moderator and guest user badges on comments
Disable Viral Menu on Main Menu?: Disable Viral Menu on Main Menu?
Here you can disable the three dots drop: Here you can disable the three dots dropdown menu
Show Featured Image on Post page?: Show Featured Image on Post page?
Show Share Icons on Post page?: Show Share Icons on Post page?

Disable this if you want use all categor: Disable this if you want use all categories for any post format.
Convert non-latin characters on post slu: Convert non-latin characters on post slug
Users can use Get From the URL option?: Users can use Get From the URL option?
Users must verify their email address: Users must verify their email address
Users must verify to create post: Users must verify to create post
Log (Email will be saved to error log): Journal (l'e-mail sera enregistré dans le journal des erreurs)
Route - Use route prefix to set language: Route - Use route prefix to set language
Cookie - Use cookies to store language: Cookie - Use cookies to store language
Name: Name
Help the Community! If you fixed a word: Aidez la communauté ! Si vous avez corrigé un mot ou si vous avez une meilleure traduction pour une phrase, n'hésitez pas à la partager avec la communauté.
